job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Staff AI Compiler Engineer, you will be at the forefront of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler development. You'll be responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects. Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform., * Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.

     * Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.

     * Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.

     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.

     * Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.

     * Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.

     * Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.
job_details.full_text:
Staff AI Compiler Engineer

As a Staff AI Compiler Engineer, you will be at the forefront of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler development. You'll be responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects. Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform., * Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.

     * Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.

     * Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.

     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.

     * Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.

     * Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.

     * Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development and optimization of a Neural Network compiler, focusing on hardware-aware transformations, supporting diverse workloads including generative AI, and ensuring performance and accuracy. This aligns with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer, particularly in algorithm development, model optimization, and productionizing systems, rather than building user-facing generative AI applications which would be characteristic of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'design compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations' and 'ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI)' directly relates to the process of creating, adapting, and optimizing models for specific hardware and workloads.
job_tasks.phrase: design compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform' indicates the adaptation and optimization of models for various AI workloads.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI)

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK' involves the core software engineering tasks of building and architecting a complex software system (compiler and SDK).
job_tasks.phrase: Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance' refers to the engineering effort to make the software system robust and efficient.
job_tasks.phrase: optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy' relates to managing and improving the end-to-end process of model compilation, which is akin to MLOps for compilers.

The phrase 'Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers' points to the operational aspects of ensuring quality and reliability in the development and deployment of the compiler system.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects' indicates an understanding of strategic goals and translating them into technical initiatives.
job_tasks.phrase: driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform' shows alignment with broader company objectives and platform advancement.
job_tasks.phrase: shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform

soft_skills.phrase: Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations
Ensure best practices in the team
Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers
modeling a standard of excellence and leadership
valuable partner to your manager and peers
